Avalanche.description: Spend 35 energy. Deal {3*t}-{5*t} damage to a random enemy twice. They lose 0-{t} speed.

Boosting Bugle.description: Spend 55 energy: heal an ally for {2*t}HP. They gain {t} attack. Repeat this once. This cannot target yourself or summons.

Challenger Arrow.description: Spend 55 energy: Deal {10*t} damage to a random enemy. Gain +{2*t} attack.

Energetic Ally.description: Spend 50 energy: The lowest non-summoned ally heals for {5*t}HP and gains 20 energy.

Explosion Powder.description: Spend 55 energy: Deal {5*t}-{10*t} damage to all enemies. If there is only one enemy, this deals double damage.

Festive Feast.description: Spend 80 energy: deal {3*t} damage to all opponents and heal {3*t} HP to all allies

Imp Horn.description: Spend 75 energy: Spend 75 Energy: Summon a level {t+8} pet imp.

Imp Whistle.description: Spend 45 energy: summon a small imp companion. {t}hp {3*t}-{4*t}atk 16 spd

Knight's Lance.description: Spend 45 energy. Deal {5*t}-{7*t} damage to a random enemy and heal the same amount. If you are at full health, this deals double damage.

Punching Bag.description: Spend 40 Energy: Deal {5*t}-{10*t} damage to a random enemy. {28+8*t}% change to knock the enemy off their feet.

Seeking Explosions.description: Spend 45 Energy: Deal {10*t+35}-{20*t+70} damage to the lowest health enemy. Repeat this 3 times. This item's exact description is unknown.
